blogs.title: Bye-bye bots: Altera's game-playing AI agents get backing from Eric Schmidt
blogs.body: Autonomous, AI-based players are coming to a gaming experience near you, and a new startup, Altera, is joining the fray to build this new guard of AI agents.
blogs.author: Lauren Forristal

blogs.title: $450M for Noname, two billion-dollar rounds, and good news for crypto startups
blogs.body: Good news, crypto founders: Venture capital activity is picking up in your sector after falling to multi-year lows in late 2023. Put another way, venture folks appear more web3-bullish than before.
blogs.author: Alex Wilhelm and Theresa Loconsolo

blogs.title: Watch: When did iPads get as expensive as MacBooks?
blogs.body: Apple's iPad event had a lot to like. New iPads with new chips and new sizes, a new Apple Pencil, and even some software updates. If you are a big fan of Apple hardware, well, it was probably a good purchase.
blogs.author: Alex Wilhelm
